description: Clemont`s Diggersby is the evolved form of Clemont`s Bunnelby. It evolved sometime before Ash Ketchum arrived in Lumiose City for some special friendship training. It battled against Ash`s Dracovish and Ash`s Sirfetch`d it a double battle but was knocked out in one attack when Ash`s Dracovish learned Dragon Rush.
name: Horuudo (Citron)
